answers.answer: Yes you go in fading.. drink the drink and get blood work after every hour till the times up.. good luck
Yup. I got my blood drawn 4 times for that test.Failed the 1 hour but i passed the 3 hour test.Good luck!
Ok thanks guys fingers crossed I pass I only failed by 3 pts on the 1 hr

I did one about 3 weeks ago!! So you get their provide a urine sample and they take your blood, they then give you the drink and the it's a blood test on the hour for the next three hours. Mine came back negative, good luck to you all and remember if you do get diagnosed with GD it's not the end on the world, and once bub is here the diabetes should leave your body!!!!

question: Is the 3 hour glucose like the one hour but fasting and obviously 3 hours? Im nervous I hope everything comes out normal.
title: 3 hour glucose
